original_text: Then Sanballat sent his officer to me with a fifth message. He carried a letter that was open for anyone to read.
korean_text: 산발랏이 다섯 번째는 그 종자의 손에 봉하지 않은 편지를 들려 내게 보냈는데

sentences.original_text: Then Sanballat sent his officer to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 산발랏이 그의 관원을 나에게 보내었는데

sentences.original_text: that was open for anyone to read.
sentences.korean_translation: 누구나 읽을 수 있도록 열려 있었습니다.
